item.name: Shifts to Parentheses
item.appendix: Shifts, when pressed alone, type parentheses. When used with other keys they're normal shifts.

item.name: Poker II Swapping
item.appendix: Change the Caps Lock to No Action in SysPrefs, then use Seil to change Caps Lock to Backquote (keycode 50), then use this to swap the two keys.

item.name: Remap Caps Lock to Hyper with Escape on tap
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps caps lock (actually F19) to Control + Shift + Option + Command, unless you tap it. Then it sends Escape.
item.autogen:
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F19,
KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::ESCAPE
